name: Make Equal
description:
How to Play Goal you need to keep the numbers on both sides equal before the game ends! Mechanism
  • The middle track will continue to carry 'operands'
  • "Next" at the top of the screen will prompt what the next 'operand' is
  • If you don't do anything with the 'operand',  the 'operand' will automatically fall into the 'Discard Area'. Then, the number of 'Discard' will increase
  • When the number of "Discard" exceeds 6, you will lose the game
  • You can drag and drop the 'operand' to one of the left, right  or 'Store Area',  it will effect the corresponding area
  • When you drag and drop the 'operand' to an area other than the above, the 'operand' will be treated as 'discard', and the number of 'discard' will increase accordingly
  • 'Store Area' can only have one 'operand' at the same time. When dragging 'operand' to a non-empty 'Store Area', the 'operand' will effect with the existing 'operand' and the number of 'Discard' will increase
  • You can drag the 'operand' in the 'Store Area' to the left or right area at any time, at the same time you can also discard it by drop it in the track
  • Finally, always keep the goal in mind

This game was originally designed for Mini Jam 46: Justice. I planned to make a game about the theme of 'Justice' a few hours before the deadline. The creative idea took about half an hour, and then the program implementation took About 2 hours or so,  finally I missed the submission time.  When I stepped out of the door, a greater loss came,  I learned that Kobe Bryant was gone.  So, I spent a few more days polishing this game into a game commemorating Kobe Bryant.

I know the NBA because of Yao Ming. Kobe Bryant was a hero of that era, and that was my youth. His spirit has always inspired us to move forward, and he tells us to stay firm and persistent in life.

May Kobe Bryant and Gigi and all those who lost their lives in this air crash rest in peace.

May everyone live in the moment and cherish those around them.
